snippet.title: Combat System trailer of Deck of Ashes
snippet.description:
Watch the new Combat System trailer of Deck of Ashes - game, which will be on Steam April 11.

Lead the cast of antiheroes on a dangerous quest! Search for powerful cards in the dark open world! Build a unique deck, and wreak havoc upon abominations in our way!
